summary: This is an internal email from July 2, 2020, congratulating the team on the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell that morning. It highlights the significant effort required to build the case based on old conduct and mentions an upcoming press conference.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email, arrested that morning and described as 'very worthy of criminal prosecution'.

events.title: Arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested this morning, as announced in the email.

events.title: Team Call Discussing Case
events.description: A call was held on Tuesday (two days prior) where the case was discussed.

events.title: Press Conference
events.description: A press conference was scheduled for 12:00 on the day of the arrest.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested on the morning of July 2, 2020.
The email emphasizes that the charges were not inevitable but resulted from extraordinary work, perseverance, and creativity by the team.
The case is based on conduct described as older than the team's paralegals, indicating historical allegations.
A press conference regarding the arrest was scheduled for 12:00 on July 2, 2020.
